PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DamperTypeFireDamper
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Fire damper type attributes. Pset renamed from Pset_DamperTypeFire to Pset_DamperTypeFireDamper in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum.

PropertyDef.Name: ActuationType
PropertyDef.Definition: Enumeration that identifies the different types of dampers

PropertyDef.Name: ClosureRatingEnum
PropertyDef.Definition: Enumeration that identifies the closure rating for the damper

PropertyDef.Name: FireResistanceRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Measure of the fire resistance rating in hours (e.g., 1.5 hours, 2 hours, etc.).

PropertyDef.Name: FusibleLinkTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: The temperature that the fusible link melts
